alert.note: Alert for Chaves (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 20 at 7:58PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM MDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is occurring. * WHERE...A portion of southeast New Mexico, including the following county, Chaves. * WHEN...Until 800 AM MDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. Low-water crossings are inundated with water and may not be passable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 756 PM MDT, emergency management reported flooding along Berrendo Creek and Highway 70. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Roswell and Midway as well as Berrendo Creek. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
